Name: Merfolk Salvager
Traits: Amphibious. The salvager can breathe air and water.
Actions: Multiattack. The salvager makes two attacks with its coral rapier. Coral Rapier. Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. Inject Toxin (2/Day). Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.
